contentfulContentfulProject.title: Virtual Reality Roller Coaster
contentfulContentfulProject.description: First VR roller coaster in the MENA region

content.value: The VR roller coaster was an exciting project. A combination of software and hardware; I designed and built a device to track the 3D orientation of the cart using 9DOF sensors calibrated to avoid outside magnetic interference coming off the other arcade devices. The device is also equipped with a hall sensor to measure the speed of the cart and a Bluetooth module for communication, all connected to an Arduino microcontroller.

Using Unity 3D, I developed a mobile space game targeted at Samsung's Gear VR, which takes in the sensor readings (via Bluetooth) and uses those values as the speed & rotation variables for the spaceship in the game.
